name: Strive for Infinity
description:
Strive for Infinity is an ambitious roguelike & RPG hybrid set in a dystopian future ruled by the Hyperspace Corporation.

The Earth was depleted, the biosphere was dying. There was no hope for humanity any more. Then the Hyperspace Corporation has invented the hyperdrive technology and used an opportunity to take over the world. New colonies were estabilished, advanced technologies have changed the lives of people, but we had to pay a high price for it, we sold them our freedom. On the outskirts of the empire, free people join their forces to overthrow the dictatorship. Today a total war begins for the fate of mankind.

In many solar systems there are still remnants of the ancient empire. Terrifying technology awaits being unveiled. You've been carrying plans of a dangerous weapon for Hyperspace Corporation aboard the ship. Out of the blue you were deceived by your employers, your ship is heavily damaged and you are the only survivor. Will you survive in the emptiness of space? Will you continue to be loyal to the corporation? Or will you support the rebels by giving them that dangerous technology? Or... will you use it yourself to overcome the limitations of this universe and reach the true infinity?!

Key features:
  • Immersive roguelike experience with adaptive difficulty
  • Spaceship controlled manually by the player using onboard systems
  • Engaging combat, pirate outposts and resource management
  • Background storylines, three different endings
  • Space exploration, automated drones, and more!
